title: navamOhana
sahitya:
navamanOhara murAri vanamAla haradhAri nava yauvanAnga maurI sumanOhara hE


anupallavi

  ramaNIya smita vadana kamanIya jita madanA harE harE yamunA vihArI su-manOhara hE


caraNam    muLIdhara gAnalOla surucira gOpIlOlA taruNAruNa padayugaLA 
karuNAmaya kambugaLA harE harE ghananIlA su-manOhara hE
